text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: PRINCEEEEEEEEESSS～～～～～! ! ! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Let's have tea ♡ and get closer ♡ 
I still remember, y'know? How to drink tea proper～

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
As I've told you many times, please discuss plans in advance. 
Now if you'll excuse me, I have training to attend to.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Instant rejection! ? Pain! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: ping～pong! Are you there Princess?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: Yes, can I help you with something——

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Hi, My Lady! Here's your love delivery!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Hot dancing! it's～all～my～～!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Boundless Love ♡ Daiichi Ruby-tan ♡

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
………………Is that all? It's almost time for lights out. 
So it's time to wrap things up———

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Woah——, wait, wait, give me a minute! ! 
I wrote some really lovely lyrics for you!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Lovey, dovey, Princess～, love you Princess! 
Hear my love delivery! Accept my love okay!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
You're so dazzlingly pretty ♡ Those red eyes are so dang kawaii♡ 
Come on it's party time and bounce right on to a paradise with me!

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: It's time for lights out, so please excuse me. Goodnight.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Wai——! 
A cold shoulder, a sad heart, but still full of love～！

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
So you'll prepare your own outfit the day of the event, all registered 
……You've been practicing every day. Is everything going well?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Thank you for your concern. 
But there are no issues.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
That's good. If there's anything I can do, let me know. 
Whether it's help with practice, or anything else.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Thank you very much. 
I really appreciate it——

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Princess Princess～～! !

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Love delivery！！ Even more than yesterday! 
You see! ? This is my love for you My Lady——

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
I'm very sorry, but even a bouquet of flowers 
isn't enough reason to choose you as my date.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Ehーー! But Why! ! 
Even though I love you so much! ? It's not enough! ?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
I understand your feelings. 
But that's not the standard I'm looking for as a date.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: I……… am aiming for the "best date".

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
I won't force my date to aim for this goal. However I would prefer 
to choose someone who has a good chance of winning.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Therefore, even if you express your feelings for me, 
it won't make me choose you as my date. I hope you understand.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
Miracle-san. I apologize for the interruption. 
Is there anything else you need from me?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ——Then, If you'll please excuse me.

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text: Oh- Princess! ? We'll be best date! I'll do my bestーー！！

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
As long as you're best date, you'll choose me right! ? 
It's a win-win yeah? I'm gettin pumped!

text_block_list.name: Daitaku Helios
text_block_list.text:
Hell yeah～! Operation Lovey Dovey Princess Part 2!! 
Let's GOOOOーー！！

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: I see, "best date"……so that's why she's……

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
……You really are amazing. 
I wish there was something I could do to help……

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
(——Two hours until breakfast. After a light jog, 
I may be able to practice dancing for about an hour and a half.)

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
(I still need to analyze footage of past "best dates". 
…If possible, I would like to collect more materials.)

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Good morning, Ruby. 
Are you going out for practice?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: My apologies. It seems I woke you.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Not at all. I was already planning to get up early 
for some light training. Don't worry about it.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
You're aiming for the "best date," right? 
I'll be rooting for you.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ——I must obtain the title. Without fail.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: ……For the sake of your family, right.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
It's important in your family, isn't it, obtaining "best date"? 
————I get it. That feeling of wanting to do your best for others.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
If you'd like, would you allow me help you? 
For example…… collecting materials from past Droite performances.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
You've been watching a lot of old Droite videos lately. 
If you need more material, I can go collect some.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
But, won't that interfere with 
your work in the committee?

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure you're busy. 
And there are other participants you're supporting as well.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text:
It's fine. 
It's my job to help all participants.

text_block_list.name: K.S. Miracle
text_block_list.text: So let me support your efforts as well.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ——……thank you, very much.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
(Miracle-san has been very kind to me. 
It's encouraging, I have to try even harder.)

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: ——……still not enough.

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
(I need more training. I need to overwhelm everyone 
with a splendid, supreme performance. This time.)

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
Daiichi Ruby is coming up from the outside, Daiichi Ruby is here! 
Will she take it!? She's crossing the line, she's done it!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
As expected, Daiichi Ruby is strong! The brilliance of 
the "splendid family" has really blossomed in the sprinters 
world this generation!

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
(Now that I've nearly reached perfect speed in short-distance 
races, I need to pledge my future victories, and win.)

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text:
(Even in school life, I must earn the title 
of "best date," and make my presence known.)

text_block_list.name: Daiichi Ruby
text_block_list.text: (————Just like Mother did.)
